name: node-poweredup
description: A Node.js module to interface with LEGO Powered UP components.

scripts.docs: jsdoc -d docs -c jsdoc.conf.json -t ./node_modules/ink-docstrap/template -R README.md dist/consts.js dist/poweredup-node.js dist/lpf2hub.js dist/wedo2smarthub.js dist/boostmovehub.js dist/puphub.js dist/pupremote.js dist/duplotrainbase.js dist/hub.js dist/consts.js
scripts.all: npm run build:node && npm run docs

author: Nathan Kellenicki <nathan@kellenicki.com>
